tasks.label: wait-for-backend
args: write-host "Waiting for Backend (port 8000)..."; $retries = 30; while ($retries -gt 0) { try { $client = New-Object System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient("127.0.0.1", 8000); $client.Close(); write-host "Backend is ready!"; exit 0 } catch { start-sleep -seconds 1; $retries-- } } write-host "Backend failed to start."; exit 1
